  "rankDetails" : {
    "friendsPassed" : [ {
      "city" : "",
      "country" : "",
      "externalIds" : { },
      "rank" : 0,
      "userId" : "",
      "userName" : "",
      "when" : ""
    } ],
    "globalCount" : 0,
    "globalFrom" : 0,
    "globalFromPercent" : 0,

        var subTitle:String = message.getSubTitle(); 
        var summary:String = message.getSummary(); 
        var title:String = message.getTitle();

    }

    A message indicating that the player’s team has achieved a new high score in the game.

    Parameter Type Description
    leaderboardData LeaderboardData The new leaderboard data associated with this message.
    leaderboardName string The leaderboard’s name.
    leaderboardShortCode string The leaderboard shortcode.
    messageId string A unique identifier for this message.
    notification boolean Flag indicating whether this message could be sent as a push notification or not.
    rankDetails LeaderboardRankDetails The ranking information for the new score.
    scriptData ScriptData[] ScriptData is arbitrary data that can be stored in a message by a Cloud Code script.
    subTitle string A textual title for the message.
    summary string A textual summary describing the message’s purpose.
    title string A textual title for the message.

    ScriptMessage

    {
  "@class" : ".ScriptMessage",
  "data" : { },
  "extCode" : "",
  "messageId" : "",
  "notification" : false,
  "scriptData" : { },
  "subTitle" : "",
  "summary" : "",
  "title" : ""
}

    ScriptMessage.Listener = (message) => {
    GSData data = message.Data; 
    string extCode = message.ExtCode; 
    string messageId = message.MessageId; 
    bool? notification = message.Notification; 
    GSEnumerable<GSData> scriptData = message.ScriptData; 
    string subTitle = message.SubTitle; 
    string summary = message.Summary; 
    string title = message.Title; 
};


    gs.getMessageHandler().setHandler(
    ".ScriptMessage",
    function (message:ScriptMessage):void {
        var data:Object = message.getData(); 
        var extCode:String = message.getExtCode(); 
        var messageId:String = message.getMessageId(); 
        var notification:Boolean = message.getNotification(); 
        var scriptData:Vector.<ScriptData> = message.getScriptData(); 
        var subTitle:String = message.getSubTitle(); 
        var summary:String = message.getSummary(); 
        var title:String = message.getTitle(); 
    }
);


    gs.getMessageHandler().setScriptMessageListener(
    new GSEventConsumer<ScriptMessage>() {
        public void onEvent(ScriptMessage event) {
        GSData data = message.getData(); 
        String extCode = message.getExtCode(); 
        String messageId = message.getMessageId(); 
        Boolean notification = message.getNotification(); 
        List<GSData> scriptData = message.getScriptData(); 
        String subTitle = message.getSubTitle(); 
        String summary = message.getSummary(); 
        String title = message.getTitle(); 
        }
    }
);

    [listener onGSScriptMessage:^(GSScriptMessage* message) {
    NSDictionary* data = [message getData]; 
    NSString* extCode = [message getExtCode]; 
    NSString* messageId = [message getMessageId]; 
    BOOL notification = [message getNotification]; 
    NSArray* scriptData = [message getScriptData]; 
    NSString* subTitle = [message getSubTitle]; 
    NSString* summary = [message getSummary]; 
    NSString* title = [message getTitle]; 
}];


    using namespace GameSparks::Core;
using namespace GameSparks::Api::Messages;
...

{
    GSData data = message.getData(); 
    gsstl::string extCode = message.getExtCode(); 
    gsstl::string messageId = message.getMessageId(); 
    Optional::t_BoolOptional notification = message.getNotification(); 
    gsstl:vector<GSData> scriptData = message.getScriptData(); 
    gsstl::string subTitle = message.getSubTitle(); 
    gsstl::string summary = message.getSummary(); 
    gsstl::string title = message.getTitle(); 
}

GS.SetMessageListener(OnScriptMessage);

    A message sent from a Cloud Code script to one or more players.

    See the Spark.sendMessage function in the Cloud Code - Java Script API documentation.

    Parameter Type Description
    data JSON JSON data sent from a Cloud Code script.
    extCode string The extension code used when creating this script message
    messageId string A unique identifier for this message.
    notification boolean Flag indicating whether this message could be sent as a push notification or not.
    scriptData ScriptData[] ScriptData is arbitrary data that can be stored in a message by a Cloud Code script.
    subTitle string A textual title for the message.
    summary string A textual summary describing the message’s purpose.
    title string A textual title for the message.

    SessionTerminatedMessage

    {
  "@class" : ".SessionTerminatedMessage",
  "authToken" : ""
}

    SessionTerminatedMessage.Listener = (message) => {
    string authToken = message.AuthToken; 
};


    gs.getMessageHandler().setHandler(
    ".SessionTerminatedMessage",
    function (message:SessionTerminatedMessage):void {
        var authToken:String = message.getAuthToken(); 
    }
);


    gs.getMessageHandler().setSessionTerminatedMessageListener(
    new GSEventConsumer<SessionTerminatedMessage>() {
        public void onEvent(SessionTerminatedMessage event) {
        String authToken = message.getAuthToken(); 
        }
    }
);

    [listener onGSSessionTerminatedMessage:^(GSSessionTerminatedMessage* message) {
    NSString* authToken = [message getAuthToken]; 
}];


    using namespace GameSparks::Core;

{
    gsstl::string authToken = message.getAuthToken(); 
}

GS.SetMessageListener(OnSessionTerminatedMessage);

    A message sent to sockets when disconnectOthers() has been called.

    Parameter Type Description
    authToken string Used to automatically re-authenticate a client during socket connect.

    SocialRankChangedMessage

    {
  "@class" : ".SocialRankChangedMessage",
  "gameId" : 0,
  "leaderboardName" : "",
  "leaderboardShortCode" : "",
  "messageId" : "",
  "notification" : false,
  "scriptData" : { },
  "subTitle" : "",
  "summary" : "",
  "them" : {
    "city" : "",
    "country" : "",
    "externalIds" : { },
    "rank" : 0,
    "userId" : "",
    "userName" : "",
    "when" : ""
  },
  "title" : "",
  "you" : {
    "city" : "",
    "country" : "",
    "externalIds" : { },
    "rank" : 0,
    "userId" : "",
    "userName" : "",
    "when" : ""
  }
}

    SocialRankChangedMessage.Listener = (message) => {
    long? gameId = message.GameId; 
    string leaderboardName = message.LeaderboardName; 
    string leaderboardShortCode = message.LeaderboardShortCode; 
    string messageId = message.MessageId; 
    bool? notification = message.Notification; 
    GSEnumerable<GSData> scriptData = message.ScriptData; 
    string subTitle = message.SubTitle; 
    string summary = message.Summary; 
    var them = message.Them; 
    string title = message.Title; 
    var you = message.You; 
};


    gs.getMessageHandler().setHandler(
    ".SocialRankChangedMessage",
    function (message:SocialRankChangedMessage):void {
        var gameId:Number = message.getGameId(); 
        var leaderboardName:String = message.getLeaderboardName(); 
        var leaderboardShortCode:String = message.getLeaderboardShortCode(); 
        var messageId:String = message.getMessageId(); 
        var notification:Boolean = message.getNotification(); 
        var scriptData:Vector.<ScriptData> = message.getScriptData(); 
        var subTitle:String = message.getSubTitle(); 
        var summary:String = message.getSummary(); 
        var them:LeaderboardData = message.getThem(); 
        var title:String = message.getTitle(); 
        var you:LeaderboardData = message.getYou(); 
    }
);


    gs.getMessageHandler().setSocialRankChangedMessageListener(
    new GSEventConsumer<SocialRankChangedMessage>() {
        public void onEvent(SocialRankChangedMessage event) {
        Long gameId = message.getGameId(); 
        String leaderboardName = message.getLeaderboardName(); 
        String leaderboardShortCode = message.getLeaderboardShortCode(); 
        String messageId = message.getMessageId(); 
        Boolean notification = message.getNotification(); 
        List<GSData> scriptData = message.getScriptData(); 
        String subTitle = message.getSubTitle(); 
        String summary = message.getSummary(); 
        LeaderboardData them = message.getThem(); 
        String title = message.getTitle(); 
        LeaderboardData you = message.getYou(); 
        }
    }
);

    [listener onGSSocialRankChangedMessage:^(GSSocialRankChangedMessage* message) {
    NSNumber* gameId = [message getGameId]; 
    NSString* leaderboardName = [message getLeaderboardName]; 
    NSString* leaderboardShortCode = [message getLeaderboardShortCode]; 
    NSString* messageId = [message getMessageId]; 
    BOOL notification = [message getNotification]; 
    NSArray* scriptData = [message getScriptData]; 
    NSString* subTitle = [message getSubTitle]; 
    NSString* summary = [message getSummary]; 
    GSLeaderboardData* them = [message getThem]; 
    NSString* title = [message getTitle]; 
    GSLeaderboardData* you = [message getYou]; 
}];


    using namespace GameSparks::Core;
using namespace GameSparks::Api::Messages;
...
void OnSocialRankChangedMessage(GS& gsInstance, const SocialRankChangedMessage& message)
{
    Optional::t_LongOptional gameId = message.getGameId(); 
    gsstl::string leaderboardName = message.getLeaderboardName(); 
    gsstl::string leaderboardShortCode = message.getLeaderboardShortCode(); 
    gsstl::string messageId = message.getMessageId(); 
    Optional::t_BoolOptional notification = message.getNotification(); 
    gsstl:vector<GSData> scriptData = message.getScriptData(); 
    gsstl::string subTitle = message.getSubTitle(); 
    gsstl::string summary = message.getSummary(); 
    Types::LeaderboardData* them = message.getThem(); 
    gsstl::string title = message.getTitle(); 
    Types::LeaderboardData* you = message.getYou(); 
}
...
GS.SetMessageListener(OnSocialRankChangedMessage);

    This message is sent to players when their rank in a leaderboard changes with respect to the rank of their social network friends.

    Parameter Type Description
    gameId number The game id that this message relates to.
    leaderboardName string The leaderboard’s name.
    leaderboardShortCode string The leaderboard shortcode.
    messageId string A unique identifier for this message.
    notification boolean Flag indicating whether this message could be sent as a push notification or not.
    scriptData ScriptData[] ScriptData is arbitrary data that can be stored in a message by a Cloud Code script.
    subTitle string A textual title for the message.
    summary string A textual summary describing the message’s purpose.
    them LeaderboardData The score details of the player whose score the receiving player has passed.
    title string A textual title for the message.
    you LeaderboardData The score details of the receiving player.

    TeamChatMessage

    {
  "@class" : ".TeamChatMessage",
  "chatMessageId" : "",
  "fromId" : "",
  "message" : "",
  "messageId" : "",
  "notification" : false,
  "ownerId" : "",
  "scriptData" : { },
  "subTitle" : "",
  "summary" : "",
  "teamId" : "",
  "teamType" : "",
  "title" : "",
  "who" : ""
}

    TeamChatMessage.Listener = (message) => {
    string chatMessageId = message.ChatMessageId; 
    string fromId = message.FromId; 
    string message = message.Message; 
    string messageId = message.MessageId; 
    bool? notification = message.Notification; 
    string ownerId = message.OwnerId; 
    GSEnumerable<GSData> scriptData = message.ScriptData; 
    string subTitle = message.SubTitle; 
    string summary = message.Summary; 
    string teamId = message.TeamId; 
    string teamType = message.TeamType; 
    string title = message.Title; 
    string who = message.Who; 
};


    gs.getMessageHandler().setHandler(
    ".TeamChatMessage",
    function (message:TeamChatMessage):void {
        var chatMessageId:String = message.getChatMessageId(); 
        var fromId:String = message.getFromId(); 
        var message:String = message.getMessage(); 
        var messageId:String = message.getMessageId(); 
        var notification:Boolean = message.getNotification(); 
        var ownerId:String = message.getOwnerId(); 
        var scriptData:Vector.<ScriptData> = message.getScriptData(); 
        var subTitle:String = message.getSubTitle(); 
        var summary:String = message.getSummary(); 
        var teamId:String = message.getTeamId(); 
        var teamType:String = message.getTeamType(); 
        var title:String = message.getTitle(); 
        var who:String = message.getWho(); 
    }
);


    gs.getMessageHandler().setTeamChatMessageListener(
    new GSEventConsumer<TeamChatMessage>() {
        public void onEvent(TeamChatMessage event) {
        String chatMessageId = message.getChatMessageId(); 
        String fromId = message.getFromId(); 
        String message = message.getMessage(); 
        String messageId = message.getMessageId(); 
        Boolean notification = message.getNotification(); 
        String ownerId = message.getOwnerId(); 
        List<GSData> scriptData = message.getScriptData(); 
        String subTitle = message.getSubTitle(); 
        String summary = message.getSummary(); 
        String teamId = message.getTeamId(); 
        String teamType = message.getTeamType(); 
        String title = message.getTitle(); 
        String who = message.getWho(); 
        }
    }
);

    [listener onGSTeamChatMessage:^(GSTeamChatMessage* message) {
    NSString* chatMessageId = [message getChatMessageId]; 
    NSString* fromId = [message getFromId]; 
    NSString* message = [message getMessage]; 
    NSString* messageId = [message getMessageId]; 
    BOOL notification = [message getNotification]; 
    NSString* ownerId = [message getOwnerId]; 
    NSArray* scriptData = [message getScriptData]; 
    NSString* subTitle = [message getSubTitle]; 
    NSString* summary = [message getSummary]; 
    NSString* teamId = [message getTeamId]; 
    NSString* teamType = [message getTeamType]; 
    NSString* title = [message getTitle]; 
    NSString* who = [message getWho]; 
}];


    using namespace GameSparks::Core;

{
    gsstl::string chatMessageId = message.getChatMessageId(); 
    gsstl::string fromId = message.getFromId(); 
    gsstl::string message = message.getMessage(); 
    gsstl::string messageId = message.getMessageId(); 
    Optional::t_BoolOptional notification = message.getNotification(); 
    gsstl::string ownerId = message.getOwnerId(); 
    gsstl:vector<GSData> scriptData = message.getScriptData(); 
    gsstl::string subTitle = message.getSubTitle(); 
    gsstl::string summary = message.getSummary(); 
    gsstl::string teamId = message.getTeamId(); 
    gsstl::string teamType = message.getTeamType(); 
    gsstl::string title = message.getTitle(); 
    gsstl::string who = message.getWho(); 
}
...
GS.SetMessageListener(OnTeamChatMessage);

    A message sent from a player to an entire team.

    Parameter Type Description
    chatMessageId string The identifier for this message as it appears in the chat history.
    fromId string The player’s id who is sending the message.
    message string The message to send to the team.
    messageId string A unique identifier for this message.
    notification boolean Flag indicating whether this message could be sent as a push notification or not.
    ownerId string The id of the owner
    scriptData ScriptData[] ScriptData is arbitrary data that can be stored in a message by a Cloud Code script.
    subTitle string A textual title for the message.
    summary string A textual summary describing the message’s purpose.
    teamId string The id of the team
    teamType string The team type
    title string A textual title for the message.
    who string The name of the player who is sending the message.

    TeamRankChangedMessage

    {
  "@class" : ".TeamRankChangedMessage",
  "gameId" : 0,
  "leaderboardName" : "",
  "leaderboardShortCode" : "",
  "messageId" : "",
  "notification" : false,
  "scriptData" : { },
  "subTitle" : "",
  "summary" : "",
  "them" : {
    "city" : "",
    "country" : "",
    "externalIds" : { },
    "rank" : 0,
    "userId" : "",
    "userName" : "",
    "when" : ""
  },
  "title" : "",
  "you" : {
    "city" : "",
    "country" : "",
    "externalIds" : { },
    "rank" : 0,
    "userId" : "",
    "userName" : "",
    "when" : ""
  }
}

    TeamRankChangedMessage.Listener = (message) => {
    long? gameId = message.GameId; 
    string leaderboardName = message.LeaderboardName; 
    string leaderboardShortCode = message.LeaderboardShortCode; 
    string messageId = message.MessageId; 
    bool? notification = message.Notification; 
    GSEnumerable<GSData> scriptData = message.ScriptData; 
    string subTitle = message.SubTitle; 
    string summary = message.Summary; 
    var them = message.Them; 
    string title = message.Title; 
    var you = message.You; 
};


    gs.getMessageHandler().setHandler(
    ".TeamRankChangedMessage",
    function (message:TeamRankChangedMessage):void {
        var gameId:Number = message.getGameId(); 
        var leaderboardName:String = message.getLeaderboardName(); 
        var leaderboardShortCode:String = message.getLeaderboardShortCode(); 
        var messageId:String = message.getMessageId(); 
        var notification:Boolean = message.getNotification(); 
        var scriptData:Vector.<ScriptData> = message.getScriptData(); 
        var subTitle:String = message.getSubTitle(); 
        var summary:String = message.getSummary(); 
        var them:LeaderboardData = message.getThem(); 
        var title:String = message.getTitle(); 
        var you:LeaderboardData = message.getYou(); 
    }
);


    gs.getMessageHandler().setTeamRankChangedMessageListener(
    new GSEventConsumer<TeamRankChangedMessage>() {
        public void onEvent(TeamRankChangedMessage event) {
        Long gameId = message.getGameId(); 
        String leaderboardName = message.getLeaderboardName(); 
        String leaderboardShortCode = message.getLeaderboardShortCode(); 
        String messageId = message.getMessageId(); 
        Boolean notification = message.getNotification(); 
        List<GSData> scriptData = message.getScriptData(); 
        String subTitle = message.getSubTitle(); 
        String summary = message.getSummary(); 
        LeaderboardData them = message.getThem(); 
        String title = message.getTitle(); 
        LeaderboardData you = message.getYou(); 
        }
    }
);

    [listener onGSTeamRankChangedMessage:^(GSTeamRankChangedMessage* message) {
    NSNumber* gameId = [message getGameId]; 
    NSString* leaderboardName = [message getLeaderboardName]; 
    NSString* leaderboardShortCode = [message getLeaderboardShortCode]; 
    NSString* messageId = [message getMessageId]; 
    BOOL notification = [message getNotification]; 
    NSArray* scriptData = [message getScriptData]; 
    NSString* subTitle = [message getSubTitle]; 
    NSString* summary = [message getSummary]; 
    GSLeaderboardData* them = [message getThem]; 
    NSString* title = [message getTitle]; 
    GSLeaderboardData* you = [message getYou]; 
}];


    using namespace GameSparks::Core;
using namespace GameSparks::Api::Messages;
...
void OnTeamRankChangedMessage(GS& gsInstance, const TeamRankChangedMessage& message)
{
    Optional::t_LongOptional gameId = message.getGameId(); 
    gsstl::string leaderboardName = message.getLeaderboardName(); 
    gsstl::string leaderboardShortCode = message.getLeaderboardShortCode(); 
    gsstl::string messageId = message.getMessageId(); 
    Optional::t_BoolOptional notification = message.getNotification(); 
    gsstl:vector<GSData> scriptData = message.getScriptData(); 
    gsstl::string subTitle = message.getSubTitle(); 
    gsstl::string summary = message.getSummary(); 
    Types::LeaderboardData* them = message.getThem(); 
    gsstl::string title = message.getTitle(); 
    Types::LeaderboardData* you = message.getYou(); 
}
...
GS.SetMessageListener(OnTeamRankChangedMessage);

    This message is sent to players when their rank in a global leaderboard changes such that they are knocked out of the configured 'Top N’.

    Parameter Type Description
    gameId number The game id that this message relates to.
    leaderboardName string The leaderboard’s name.
    leaderboardShortCode string The leaderboard shortcode.
    messageId string A unique identifier for this message.
    notification boolean Flag indicating whether this message could be sent as a push notification or not.
    scriptData ScriptData[] ScriptData is arbitrary data that can be stored in a message by a Cloud Code script.
    subTitle string A textual title for the message.
    summary string A textual summary describing the message’s purpose.
    them LeaderboardData The score details of the team whose score the receiving team’s players have passed.
    title string A textual title for the message.
    you LeaderboardData The score details of the receiving team.

    UploadCompleteMessage

    {
  "@class" : ".UploadCompleteMessage",
  "messageId" : "",
  "notification" : false,
  "scriptData" : { },
  "subTitle" : "",
  "summary" : "",
  "title" : "",
  "uploadData" : {
    "fileName" : "",
    "playerId" : ""
  },
  "uploadId" : ""
}

    UploadCompleteMessage.Listener = (message) => {
    string messageId = message.MessageId; 
    bool? notification = message.Notification; 
    GSEnumerable<GSData> scriptData = message.ScriptData; 
    string subTitle = message.SubTitle; 
    string summary = message.Summary; 
    string title = message.Title; 
    GSData uploadData = message.UploadData; 
    string uploadId = message.UploadId; 
};


    gs.getMessageHandler().setHandler(
    ".UploadCompleteMessage",
    function (message:UploadCompleteMessage):void {
        var messageId:String = message.getMessageId(); 
        var notification:Boolean = message.getNotification(); 
        var scriptData:Vector.<ScriptData> = message.getScriptData(); 
        var subTitle:String = message.getSubTitle(); 
        var summary:String = message.getSummary(); 
        var title:String = message.getTitle(); 
        var uploadData:UploadData = message.getUploadData(); 
        var uploadId:String = message.getUploadId(); 
    }
);


    gs.getMessageHandler().setUploadCompleteMessageListener(
    new GSEventConsumer<UploadCompleteMessage>() {
        public void onEvent(UploadCompleteMessage event) {
        String messageId = message.getMessageId(); 
        Boolean notification = message.getNotification(); 
        List<GSData> scriptData = message.getScriptData(); 
        String subTitle = message.getSubTitle(); 
        String summary = message.getSummary(); 
        String title = message.getTitle(); 
        GSData uploadData = message.getUploadData(); 
        String uploadId = message.getUploadId(); 
        }
    }
);

    [listener onGSUploadCompleteMessage:^(GSUploadCompleteMessage* message) {
    NSString* messageId = [message getMessageId]; 
    BOOL notification = [message getNotification]; 
    NSArray* scriptData = [message getScriptData]; 
    NSString* subTitle = [message getSubTitle]; 
    NSString* summary = [message getSummary]; 
    NSString* title = [message getTitle]; 
    NSDictionary* uploadData = [message getUploadData]; 
    NSString* uploadId = [message getUploadId]; 
}];


    using namespace GameSparks::Core;
using namespace GameSparks::Api::Messages;
...
void OnUploadCompleteMessage(GS& gsInstance, const UploadCompleteMessage& message)
{
    gsstl::string messageId = message.getMessageId(); 
    Optional::t_BoolOptional notification = message.getNotification(); 
    gsstl:vector<GSData> scriptData = message.getScriptData(); 
    gsstl::string subTitle = message.getSubTitle(); 
    gsstl::string summary = message.getSummary(); 
    gsstl::string title = message.getTitle(); 
    GSData uploadData = message.getUploadData(); 
    gsstl::string uploadId = message.getUploadId(); 
}
...
GS.SetMessageListener(OnUploadCompleteMessage);

    A message indicating that the asynchronous upload task trigger by the player is now complete.

    Parameter Type Description
    messageId string A unique identifier for this message.
    notification boolean Flag indicating whether this message could be sent as a push notification or not.
    scriptData ScriptData[] ScriptData is arbitrary data that can be stored in a message by a Cloud Code script.
    subTitle string A textual title for the message.
    summary string A textual summary describing the message’s purpose.
    title string A textual title for the message.
    uploadData UploadData The upload data (if supplied as part of GetUploadUrlRequest) of UploadData objects
    uploadId string The id of the upload

    Data Types

    Achievement

    {
  "description" : "",
  "earned" : false,
  "name" : "",
  "propertySet" : { },
  "shortCode" : ""
}

GSDateTime::t_Optional created = bulkJob.getCreated(); 
Types::DBObject* data = bulkJob.getData();

Optional::t_LongOptional errorCount = bulkJob.getErrorCount(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional estimatedCount = bulkJob.getEstimatedCount();

gsstl::string moduleShortCode = bulkJob.getModuleShortCode(); 
Types::DBObject* playerQuery = bulkJob.getPlayerQuery(); 
GSDateTime::t_Optional scheduledTime = bulkJob.getScheduledTime(); 
gsstl::string script = bulkJob.getScript(); 
GSDateTime::t_Optional started = bulkJob.getStarted(); 
gsstl::string state = bulkJob.getState();

    A nested object that represents the bulk job.

    Parameter Type Description
    actualCount number The actual count of players affected by the bulk job (calculated when the job started to run)
    completed date The time at which the bulk job completed execution
    created date The time at which the bulk job was created
    data DBObject Data to be passed into the Module or Script
    doneCount number The number of players processed by the bulk job so far
    errorCount number The number of errors encountered whilst running the Module or Script for players
    estimatedCount number The estimated count of players affected by the bulk job (estimated when the job was submitted)
    id string The ID for the bulk job
    moduleShortCode string The Cloud Code Module to run for each player
    playerQuery DBObject The query to identify players to perform the bulk job on
    scheduledTime date The time at which the job was scheduled to run
    script string The Cloud Code script to run for each player
    started date The time at which the bulk job started to execute
    state string The current state of the bulk job

    Challenge

    {
  "accepted" : [ {
    "externalIds" : { },
    "id" : "",
    "name" : ""
  } ],
  "challengeId" : "",
  "challengeMessage" : "",
  "challengeName" : "",
  "challenged" : [ {
    "externalIds" : { },
    "id" : "",
    "name" : ""
  } ],
  "challenger" : {
    "externalIds" : { },
    "id" : "",
    "name" : ""
  },
  "currency1Wager" : 0,
  "currency2Wager" : 0,
  "currency3Wager" : 0,
  "currency4Wager" : 0,
  "currency5Wager" : 0,
  "currency6Wager" : 0,
  "currencyWagers" : { },
  "declined" : [ {
    "externalIds" : { },
    "id" : "",
    "name" : ""
  } ],
  "endDate" : "2017-09-27T09:47Z",
  "expiryDate" : "2017-09-27T09:47Z",
  "maxTurns" : 0,
  "nextPlayer" : "",
  "scriptData" : { },
  "shortCode" : "",
  "startDate" : "2017-09-27T09:47Z",
  "state" : "",
  "turnCount" : [ {
    "count" : "",
    "playerId" : ""
  } ]
}

    GSEnumerable<var> accepted = challenge.Accepted; 
string challengeId = challenge.ChallengeId; 
string challengeMessage = challenge.ChallengeMessage; 
string challengeName = challenge.ChallengeName; 
GSEnumerable<var> challenged = challenge.Challenged; 
var challenger = challenge.Challenger; 
long? currency1Wager = challenge.Currency1Wager; 
long? currency2Wager = challenge.Currency2Wager; 
long? currency3Wager = challenge.Currency3Wager; 
long? currency4Wager = challenge.Currency4Wager; 
long? currency5Wager = challenge.Currency5Wager; 
long? currency6Wager = challenge.Currency6Wager; 
GSData currencyWagers = challenge.CurrencyWagers;

DateTime? endDate = challenge.EndDate; 
DateTime? expiryDate = challenge.ExpiryDate; 
long? maxTurns = challenge.MaxTurns; 
string nextPlayer = challenge.NextPlayer; 
GSEnumerable<GSData> scriptData = challenge.ScriptData; 
string shortCode = challenge.ShortCode; 
DateTime? startDate = challenge.StartDate; 
string state = challenge.State;

    var accepted:Vector.<PlayerDetail> = challenge.getAccepted();

var challengeMessage:String = challenge.getChallengeMessage(); 
var challengeName:String = challenge.getChallengeName();

var currency2Wager:Number = challenge.getCurrency2Wager();

var declined:Vector.<PlayerDetail> = challenge.getDeclined(); 
var endDate:Date = challenge.getEndDate(); 
var expiryDate:Date = challenge.getExpiryDate(); 
var maxTurns:Number = challenge.getMaxTurns(); 
var nextPlayer:String = challenge.getNextPlayer();

    List<PlayerDetail> accepted = challenge.getAccepted();

String challengeName = challenge.getChallengeName();

Long currency2Wager = challenge.getCurrency2Wager();

Long currency5Wager = challenge.getCurrency5Wager();

Date endDate = challenge.getEndDate(); 
Date expiryDate = challenge.getExpiryDate(); 
Long maxTurns = challenge.getMaxTurns();

Date startDate = challenge.getStartDate(); 
String state = challenge.getState(); 
List<PlayerTurnCount> turnCount = challenge.getTurnCount(); 

    NSArray* accepted = [challenge getAccepted]; 
NSString* challengeId = [challenge getChallengeId]; 
NSString* challengeMessage = [challenge getChallengeMessage]; 
NSString* challengeName = [challenge getChallengeName];

GSPlayerDetail* challenger = [challenge getChallenger];

NSNumber* currency2Wager = [challenge getCurrency2Wager];

NSDate* expiryDate = [challenge getExpiryDate]; 
NSNumber* maxTurns = [challenge getMaxTurns];

NSDate* startDate = [challenge getStartDate];

    gsstl:vector<Types::PlayerDetail*> accepted = challenge.getAccepted(); 
gsstl::string challengeId = challenge.getChallengeId(); 
gsstl::string challengeMessage = challenge.getChallengeMessage(); 
gsstl::string challengeName = challenge.getChallengeName(); 
gsstl:vector<Types::PlayerDetail*> challenged = challenge.getChallenged(); 
Types::PlayerDetail* challenger = challenge.getChallenger(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional currency1Wager = challenge.getCurrency1Wager(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional currency2Wager = challenge.getCurrency2Wager(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional currency3Wager = challenge.getCurrency3Wager(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional currency4Wager = challenge.getCurrency4Wager(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional currency5Wager = challenge.getCurrency5Wager(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional currency6Wager = challenge.getCurrency6Wager(); 
GSData currencyWagers = challenge.getCurrencyWagers(); 
gsstl:vector<Types::PlayerDetail*> declined = challenge.getDeclined(); 
GSDateTime::t_Optional endDate = challenge.getEndDate(); 
GSDateTime::t_Optional expiryDate = challenge.getExpiryDate(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional maxTurns = challenge.getMaxTurns(); 
gsstl::string nextPlayer = challenge.getNextPlayer(); 
gsstl:vector<GSData> scriptData = challenge.getScriptData(); 
gsstl::string shortCode = challenge.getShortCode(); 
GSDateTime::t_Optional startDate = challenge.getStartDate(); 
gsstl::string state = challenge.getState(); 
gsstl:vector<Types::PlayerTurnCount*> turnCount = challenge.getTurnCount();

    A nested object that represents the challenge data.

    Parameter Type Description
    accepted PlayerDetail[] A list of PlayerDetail objects that represents the players that have accepted this challenge.
    challengeId string A unique identifier for this challenge.
    challengeMessage string The message included in the challenge by the challenging player who created the challenge.
    challengeName string The name of the challenge that this message relates to.
    challenged PlayerDetail[] A list of PlayerDetail objects that represents the players that were challenged in this challenge.
    challenger PlayerDetail Details of the player who issued this challenge.
    currency1Wager number The amount of type 1 currency that has been wagered on this challenge.
    currency2Wager number The amount of type 2 currency that has been wagered on this challenge.
    currency3Wager number The amount of type 3 currency that has been wagered on this challenge.
    currency4Wager number The amount of type 4 currency that has been wagered on this challenge.
    currency5Wager number The amount of type 5 currency that has been wagered on this challenge.
    currency6Wager number The amount of type 6 currency that has been wagered on this challenge.
    currencyWagers JSON An object representing the currencies that have been wagered on this challenge.
    declined PlayerDetail[] A list of PlayerDetail objects that represents the players that have declined this challenge.
    endDate date The date when the challenge ends.
    expiryDate date The latest date that a player can accept the challenge.
    maxTurns number The maximum number of turns that this challenge is configured for.
    nextPlayer string In a turn based challenge this fields contains the player’s id whose turn it is next.
    scriptData ScriptData[] ScriptData is arbitrary data that can be stored in a challenge instance by a Cloud Code script.
    shortCode string The challenge’s short code.
    startDate date The date when the challenge starts.
    state string One of these possible state values: ISSUED, EXPIRED, ACCEPTED, DECLINED, COMPLETE, WITHDRAWN, RUNNING, WAITING, RECEIVED
    turnCount PlayerTurnCount[] A collection containing the number of turns taken by each player that has accepted the challenge.

    ChallengeType

    {
  "challengeShortCode" : "",
  "description" : "",
  "getleaderboardName" : "",
  "name" : "",
  "tags" : ""
}

    string challengeShortCode = challengeType.ChallengeShortCode; 
string description = challengeType.Description; 
string getleaderboardName = challengeType.GetleaderboardName; 
string name = challengeType.Name; 
string tags = challengeType.Tags; 

    var challengeShortCode:String = challengeType.getChallengeShortCode(); 
var description:String = challengeType.getDescription(); 
var getleaderboardName:String = challengeType.getGetleaderboardName(); 
var name:String = challengeType.getName(); 
var tags:String = challengeType.getTags(); 

    String challengeShortCode = challengeType.getChallengeShortCode(); 
String description = challengeType.getDescription(); 
String getleaderboardName = challengeType.getGetleaderboardName(); 
String name = challengeType.getName(); 
String tags = challengeType.getTags(); 

    NSString* challengeShortCode = [challengeType getChallengeShortCode]; 
NSString* description = [challengeType getDescription]; 
NSString* getleaderboardName = [challengeType getGetleaderboardName]; 
NSString* name = [challengeType getName]; 
NSString* tags = [challengeType getTags]; 

    gsstl::string challengeShortCode = challengeType.getChallengeShortCode(); 
gsstl::string description = challengeType.getDescription(); 
gsstl::string getleaderboardName = challengeType.getGetleaderboardName(); 
gsstl::string name = challengeType.getName(); 
gsstl::string tags = challengeType.getTags();
    Parameter Type Description
    challengeShortCode string The shortCode for this challenge.
    description string The description of this challenge.
    getleaderboardName string The name of the leaderboard for this challenge.
    name string The name of this challenge.
    tags string The tags for this challenge.

    ChatMessage

    {
  "@class" : ".ChatMessage",
  "fromId" : "",
  "id" : "",
  "message" : "",
  "when" : "2017-09-27T09:47Z",
  "who" : ""
}

    string fromId = chatMessage.FromId;

gsstl::string who = chatMessage.getWho();

    A message from a group chat

    Parameter Type Description
    fromId string The id of the player who sent this message
    id string The id of this chat message
    message string The text sent in this message
    when date A date representing the time this message was sent
    who string The displayName of the player who sent this message

    Leaderboard

    {
  "description" : "",
  "name" : "",
  "propertySet" : { },
  "shortCode" : ""
}

    string description = leaderboard.Description;

    var description:String = leaderboard.getDescription();

    A nested object that represents the leaderboard configuration data.

    Parameter Type Description
    description string The leaderboard’s description.
    name string The leaderboard’s name.
    propertySet JSON The custom property set configured on this Leaderboard
    shortCode string The leaderboard’s short code.

    LeaderboardData

    {
  "city" : "",
  "country" : "",
  "externalIds" : { },
  "rank" : 0,
  "userId" : "",
  "userName" : "",
  "when" : ""
}

    string city = leaderboardData.City; 
string country = leaderboardData.Country; 
GSData externalIds = leaderboardData.ExternalIds; 
long? rank = leaderboardData.Rank; 
string userId = leaderboardData.UserId; 
string userName = leaderboardData.UserName; 
string when = leaderboardData.When; 

    var city:String = leaderboardData.getCity(); 
var country:String = leaderboardData.getCountry(); 
var externalIds:Object = leaderboardData.getExternalIds(); 
var rank:Number = leaderboardData.getRank(); 
var userId:String = leaderboardData.getUserId(); 
var userName:String = leaderboardData.getUserName(); 
var when:String = leaderboardData.getWhen(); 

    String city = leaderboardData.getCity(); 
String country = leaderboardData.getCountry(); 
GSData externalIds = leaderboardData.getExternalIds(); 
Long rank = leaderboardData.getRank(); 
String userId = leaderboardData.getUserId(); 
String userName = leaderboardData.getUserName(); 
String when = leaderboardData.getWhen(); 

    NSString* city = [leaderboardData getCity]; 
NSString* country = [leaderboardData getCountry]; 
NSDictionary* externalIds = [leaderboardData getExternalIds]; 
NSNumber* rank = [leaderboardData getRank]; 
NSString* userId = [leaderboardData getUserId]; 
NSString* userName = [leaderboardData getUserName]; 
NSString* when = [leaderboardData getWhen]; 

    gsstl::string city = leaderboardData.getCity(); 
gsstl::string country = leaderboardData.getCountry(); 
GSData externalIds = leaderboardData.getExternalIds(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional rank = leaderboardData.getRank(); 
gsstl::string userId = leaderboardData.getUserId(); 
gsstl::string userName = leaderboardData.getUserName(); 
gsstl::string when = leaderboardData.getWhen();

    Leaderboard entry data

    As well as the parameters below there may be others depending on your game’s configuration.

    Parameter Type Description
    city string The city where the player was located when they logged this leaderboard entry.
    country string The country code where the player was located when they logged this leaderboard entry.
    externalIds JSON The players rank.
    rank number The players rank.
    userId string The unique player id for this leaderboard entry.
    userName string The players display name.
    when string The date when this leaderboard entry was created.

    LeaderboardRankDetails

    {
  "friendsPassed" : [ {
    "city" : "",
    "country" : "",
    "externalIds" : { },
    "rank" : 0,
    "userId" : "",
    "userName" : "",
    "when" : ""
  } ],
  "globalCount" : 0,
  "globalFrom" : 0,
  "globalFromPercent" : 0,
  "globalTo" : 0,
  "globalToPercent" : 0,
  "socialCount" : 0,
  "socialFrom" : 0,
  "socialFromPercent" : 0,
  "socialTo" : 0,
  "socialToPercent" : 0,
  "topNPassed" : [ {
    "city" : "",
    "country" : "",
    "externalIds" : { },
    "rank" : 0,
    "userId" : "",
    "userName" : "",
    "when" : ""
  } ]
}

    GSEnumerable<var> friendsPassed = leaderboardRankDetails.FriendsPassed; 
long? globalCount = leaderboardRankDetails.GlobalCount; 
long? globalFrom = leaderboardRankDetails.GlobalFrom; 
long? globalFromPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.GlobalFromPercent; 
long? globalTo = leaderboardRankDetails.GlobalTo; 
long? globalToPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.GlobalToPercent; 
long? socialCount = leaderboardRankDetails.SocialCount; 
long? socialFrom = leaderboardRankDetails.SocialFrom; 
long? socialFromPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.SocialFromPercent; 
long? socialTo = leaderboardRankDetails.SocialTo; 
long? socialToPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.SocialToPercent; 
GSEnumerable<var> topNPassed = leaderboardRankDetails.TopNPassed; 

    var friendsPassed:Vector.<LeaderboardData> = leaderboardRankDetails.getFriendsPassed(); 
var globalCount:Number = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalCount(); 
var globalFrom:Number = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalFrom(); 
var globalFromPercent:Number = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalFromPercent(); 
var globalTo:Number = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalTo(); 
var globalToPercent:Number = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalToPercent(); 
var socialCount:Number = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialCount(); 
var socialFrom:Number = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialFrom(); 
var socialFromPercent:Number = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialFromPercent(); 
var socialTo:Number = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialTo(); 
var socialToPercent:Number = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialToPercent(); 
var topNPassed:Vector.<LeaderboardData> = leaderboardRankDetails.getTopNPassed(); 

    List<LeaderboardData> friendsPassed = leaderboardRankDetails.getFriendsPassed(); 
Long globalCount = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalCount(); 
Long globalFrom = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalFrom(); 
Long globalFromPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalFromPercent(); 
Long globalTo = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalTo(); 
Long globalToPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalToPercent(); 
Long socialCount = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialCount(); 
Long socialFrom = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialFrom(); 
Long socialFromPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialFromPercent(); 
Long socialTo = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialTo(); 
Long socialToPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialToPercent(); 
List<LeaderboardData> topNPassed = leaderboardRankDetails.getTopNPassed(); 

    NSArray* friendsPassed = [leaderboardRankDetails getFriendsPassed]; 
NSNumber* globalCount = [leaderboardRankDetails getGlobalCount]; 
NSNumber* globalFrom = [leaderboardRankDetails getGlobalFrom]; 
NSNumber* globalFromPercent = [leaderboardRankDetails getGlobalFromPercent]; 
NSNumber* globalTo = [leaderboardRankDetails getGlobalTo]; 
NSNumber* globalToPercent = [leaderboardRankDetails getGlobalToPercent]; 
NSNumber* socialCount = [leaderboardRankDetails getSocialCount]; 
NSNumber* socialFrom = [leaderboardRankDetails getSocialFrom]; 
NSNumber* socialFromPercent = [leaderboardRankDetails getSocialFromPercent]; 
NSNumber* socialTo = [leaderboardRankDetails getSocialTo]; 
NSNumber* socialToPercent = [leaderboardRankDetails getSocialToPercent]; 
NSArray* topNPassed = [leaderboardRankDetails getTopNPassed]; 

    gsstl:vector<Types::LeaderboardData*> friendsPassed = leaderboardRankDetails.getFriendsPassed(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional globalCount = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalCount(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional globalFrom = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalFrom(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional globalFromPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalFromPercent(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional globalTo = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalTo(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional globalToPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.getGlobalToPercent(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional socialCount = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialCount(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional socialFrom = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialFrom(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional socialFromPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialFromPercent(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional socialTo = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialTo(); 
Optional::t_LongOptional socialToPercent = leaderboardRankDetails.getSocialToPercent(); 
gsstl:vector<Types::LeaderboardData*> topNPassed = leaderboardRankDetails.getTopNPassed();

    Ranking information.

    Parameter Type Description
    friendsPassed LeaderboardData[] The leaderboard entries of the players friends that were beaten as part of this score submission.
    globalCount number The number of entries in this leaderboard.
    globalFrom number The Global Rank of the player in this leaderboard before the score was submitted.
    globalFromPercent number The old global rank of the player as a percentage of the total number of scores in this leaderboard .
    globalTo number The Global Rank of the player in this leaderboard after the score was submitted.
    globalToPercent number The new global rank of the player as a percentage of the total number of scores in this leaderboard .
    socialCount number The number of friend entries the player has in this leaderboard.
    socialFrom number The Social Rank of the player in this leaderboard before the score was submitted.
    socialFromPercent number The old social rank of the player as a percentage of the total number of friend scores in this leaderboard.
    socialTo number The Social Rank of the player in this leaderboard after the score was submitted.
    socialToPercent number The old global rank of the player as a percentage of the total number of friend scores in this leaderboard.
    topNPassed LeaderboardData[] The leaderboard entries of the global players that were beaten as part of this score submission. Requires Top N to be configured on the leaderboard

    Location

  "city" : "",
  "country" : "",
  "latitide" : { },
  "longditute" : { }

var longditute:Number = location.getLongditute();

NSNumber* longditute = [location getLongditute];

    Parameter Type Description

    country string The country
    latitide Float The latitude
    longditute Float The longditute

    participantData JSON A JSON Map of any data that was associated to this user

    skill number The skill of the player in this match

  "achievements" : [ "" ],

  "peerId" : 0,
  "scriptData" : { },
  "virtualGoods" : [ "" ]

    A nested object that represents a participant in a match.

    Parameter Type Description
    achievements string[] The achievements of the Player
    displayName string The display name of the Player
    externalIds JSON The external Id’s of the Player
    id string The Id of the Player
    online boolean The online status of the Player
    participantData JSON A JSON Map of any data that was associated to this user
    peerId number The peerId of this participant within the match
    scriptData JSON The script data of the Player
    virtualGoods string[] The virtual goods of the Player

    PendingMatch

    {
  "id" : "",
  "matchData" : { },
  "matchGroup" : "",
  "matchShortCode" : "",
  "matchedPlayers" : [ {
    "location" : { },
    "participantData" : { },
    "playerId" : "",
    "skill" : { }
  } ],
  "skill" : { }
}

    string id = pendingMatch.Id; 
GSData matchData = pendingMatch.MatchData; 
string matchGroup = pendingMatch.MatchGroup; 
string matchShortCode = pendingMatch.MatchShortCode; 
GSEnumerable<var> matchedPlayers = pendingMatch.MatchedPlayers; 
var skill = pendingMatch.Skill; 

    var id:String = pendingMatch.getId(); 
var matchData:Object = pendingMatch.getMatchData(); 
var matchGroup:String = pendingMatch.getMatchGroup(); 
var matchShortCode:String = pendingMatch.getMatchShortCode(); 
var matchedPlayers:Vector.<MatchedPlayer> = pendingMatch.getMatchedPlayers(); 
var skill:Double = pendingMatch.getSkill(); 

    String id = pendingMatch.getId(); 
GSData matchData = pendingMatch.getMatchData(); 
String matchGroup = pendingMatch.getMatchGroup(); 
String matchShortCode = pendingMatch.getMatchShortCode(); 
List<MatchedPlayer> matchedPlayers = pendingMatch.getMatchedPlayers(); 
Double skill = pendingMatch.getSkill(); 

    NSString* id = [pendingMatch getId]; 
NSDictionary* matchData = [pendingMatch getMatchData]; 
NSString* matchGroup = [pendingMatch getMatchGroup]; 
NSString* matchShortCode = [pendingMatch getMatchShortCode]; 
NSArray* matchedPlayers = [pendingMatch getMatchedPlayers]; 
GSDouble* skill = [pendingMatch getSkill]; 

    gsstl::string id = pendingMatch.getId(); 
GSData matchData = pendingMatch.getMatchData(); 
gsstl::string matchGroup = pendingMatch.getMatchGroup(); 
gsstl::string matchShortCode = pendingMatch.getMatchShortCode(); 
gsstl:vector<Types::MatchedPlayer*> matchedPlayers = pendingMatch.getMatchedPlayers(); 
Types::Double* skill = pendingMatch.getSkill();

    An object that represents a pending match.

    Parameter Type Description
    id string The ID for the pending match
    matchData JSON A JSON Map of the matchData associated to this pending match
    matchGroup string The match group for the pending match
    matchShortCode string The match shortCode for the pending match
    matchedPlayers MatchedPlayer[] The players already part of this pending match
    skill number The average skill of players in this pending match

    PlayerMessage

    {
  "id" : "",
  "message" : { },
  "seen" : false,
  "status" : "",
  "when" : "2017-09-27T09:47Z"
}

GSDateTime::t_Optional when = playerMessage.getWhen();

    A nested object that represents a player message.

    Parameter Type Description
    id string The id of the message
    message JSON The message content
    seen boolean Whether the message has been delivered to the client
    status string The status of the message
    when date The date of the message

    PlayerTransaction

    {
  "items" : [ {
    "amount" : 0,
    "newValue" : 0,
    "type" : ""
  } ],
  "originalRequestId" : "",
  "playerId" : "",
  "reason" : "",
  "revokeDate" : "2017-09-27T09:47Z",
  "revoked" : false,
  "script" : "",
  "scriptType" : "",
  "transactionId" : "",
  "when" : "2017-09-27T09:47Z"
}

    GSEnumerable<var> items = playerTransaction.Items; 
string originalRequestId = playerTransaction.OriginalRequestId; 
string playerId = playerTransaction.PlayerId; 
string reason = playerTransaction.Reason; 
DateTime? revokeDate = playerTransaction.RevokeDate; 
bool? revoked = playerTransaction.Revoked; 
string script = playerTransaction.Script; 
string scriptType = playerTransaction.ScriptType; 
string transactionId = playerTransaction.TransactionId; 
DateTime? when = playerTransaction.When; 

    var items:Vector.<PlayerTransactionItem> = playerTransaction.getItems(); 
var originalRequestId:String = playerTransaction.getOriginalRequestId(); 
var playerId:String = playerTransaction.getPlayerId(); 
var reason:String = playerTransaction.getReason(); 
var revokeDate:Date = playerTransaction.getRevokeDate(); 
var revoked:Boolean = playerTransaction.getRevoked(); 
var script:String = playerTransaction.getScript(); 
var scriptType:String = playerTransaction.getScriptType(); 
var transactionId:String = playerTransaction.getTransactionId(); 
var when:Date = playerTransaction.getWhen(); 

    List<PlayerTransactionItem> items = playerTransaction.getItems(); 
String originalRequestId = playerTransaction.getOriginalRequestId(); 
String playerId = playerTransaction.getPlayerId(); 
String reason = playerTransaction.getReason(); 
Date revokeDate = playerTransaction.getRevokeDate(); 
Boolean revoked = playerTransaction.getRevoked(); 
String script = playerTransaction.getScript(); 
String scriptType = playerTransaction.getScriptType(); 
String transactionId = playerTransaction.getTransactionId(); 
Date when = playerTransaction.getWhen(); 

    NSArray* items = [playerTransaction getItems]; 
NSString* originalRequestId = [playerTransaction getOriginalRequestId]; 
NSString* playerId = [playerTransaction getPlayerId]; 
NSString* reason = [playerTransaction getReason]; 
NSDate* revokeDate = [playerTransaction getRevokeDate]; 
BOOL revoked = [playerTransaction getRevoked]; 
NSString* script = [playerTransaction getScript]; 
NSString* scriptType = [playerTransaction getScriptType]; 
NSString* transactionId = [playerTransaction getTransactionId]; 
NSDate* when = [playerTransaction getWhen]; 

    gsstl:vector<Types::PlayerTransactionItem*> items = playerTransaction.getItems(); 
gsstl::string originalRequestId = playerTransaction.getOriginalRequestId(); 
gsstl::string playerId = playerTransaction.getPlayerId(); 
gsstl::string reason = playerTransaction.getReason(); 
GSDateTime::t_Optional revokeDate = playerTransaction.getRevokeDate(); 
Optional::t_BoolOptional revoked = playerTransaction.getRevoked(); 
gsstl::string script = playerTransaction.getScript(); 
gsstl::string scriptType = playerTransaction.getScriptType(); 
gsstl::string transactionId = playerTransaction.getTransactionId(); 
GSDateTime::t_Optional when = playerTransaction.getWhen();

    A nested object that represents a player transaction.

    Parameter Type Description
    items PlayerTransactionItem[] The items (currency or virtual goods) involved in this transaction
    originalRequestId string The original request ID for this transaction
    playerId string The player ID
    reason string The reason for the transaction
    revokeDate date Gets the date when this transaction was revoked, if applicable
    revoked boolean Is true if the transaction was revoked
    script string The specific script in which this transaction occurred
    scriptType string The script type in which this transaction occurred (e.g. event)
    transactionId string The transaction ID of this purchase, if applicable
    when date The date of the transaction

    PlayerTransactionItem

    {
  "amount" : 0,
  "newValue" : 0,
  "type" : ""
}

    long? amount = playerTransactionItem.Amount;

string type = playerTransactionItem.Type; 

    var amount:Number = playerTransactionItem.getAmount(); 
var newValue:Number = playerTransactionItem.getNewValue();

    Long amount = playerTransactionItem.getAmount();

NSNumber* newValue = [playerTransactionItem getNewValue];

    Optional::t_LongOptional amount = playerTransactionItem.getAmount();

    A nested object that represents a single item in a transaction.

    Parameter Type Description
    amount number The amount of this item given to the player in the transaction
    newValue number The quantity the player possesses after the transaction completed
    type string The type of item

    A nested object that represents the virtual good.

    Parameter Type Description
    WP8StoreProductId string The Windows Phone 8 productId of the item.
    amazonStoreProductId string The Amazon Store productId of the item.
    baseCurrency1Cost number The Base Currency1 cost of the Virtual Good, before segmentation
    baseCurrency2Cost number The Base Currency2 cost of the Virtual Good, before segmentation
    baseCurrency3Cost number The Base Currency3 cost of the Virtual Good, before segmentation
    baseCurrency4Cost number The Base Currency4 cost of the Virtual Good, before segmentation
    baseCurrency5Cost number The Base Currency5 cost of the Virtual Good, before segmentation
    baseCurrency6Cost number The Base Currency6 cost of the Virtual Good, before segmentation
    baseCurrencyCosts JSON The Base currency costs of the Virtual Good, before experiments
    bundledGoods BundledGood[] Returns the bundle goods of the virtual good
    currency1Cost number The Currency1 cost of the Virtual Good
    currency2Cost number The Currency2 cost of the Virtual Good
    currency3Cost number The Currency3 cost of the Virtual Good
    currency4Cost number The Currency4 cost of the Virtual Good
    currency5Cost number The Currency5 cost of the Virtual Good
    currency6Cost number The Currency6 cost of the Virtual Good
    currencyCosts JSON The currency costs of the Virtual Good
    description string The description of the Virtual Good
    disabled boolean Whether the item is disabled.
    googlePlayProductId string The google play productId of the item.
    iosAppStoreProductId string The iOS AppStore productId of the item.
    maxQuantity number The maximum number of the Virtual Good that can be owned at one time
    name string The name of the Virtual Good
    propertySet JSON The custom property set configured on the item.
    psnStoreProductId string The PSN Store productId of the item.
    segmentedCurrency1Cost number The Segmented Currency1 cost of the Virtual Good, before experiments
    segmentedCurrency2Cost number The Segmented Currency2 cost of the Virtual Good, before experiments
    segmentedCurrency3Cost number The Segmented Currency3 cost of the Virtual Good, before experiments
    segmentedCurrency4Cost number The Segmented Currency4 cost of the Virtual Good, before experiments
    segmentedCurrency5Cost number The Segmented Currency5 cost of the Virtual Good, before experiments
    segmentedCurrency6Cost number The Segmented Currency6 cost of the Virtual Good, before experiments
    segmentedCurrencyCosts JSON The segmented currency costs of the Virtual Good, before experiments
    shortCode string The short code of the Virtual Good
    steamStoreProductId string The Steam Store productId of the item.
    tags string The tags of the Virtual Good
    type string The type of the virtual good, “VGOOD” or “CURRENCY”
    w8StoreProductId string The Windows 8 productId of the item.























    C# C++ Java AS3 Objective-C Cloud Code JSON RT Scripts
